content: A mixture of H2DCPB (6 mg, 0.02 mmol), Zn­(NO3)2·6H2O (9 mg, 0.03 mmol), DMF (1 mL), and triethylamine (0.025 mL) were kept at 85 °C for 12 h, followed by cooling to room temperature. Colorless octahedron crystals were obtained and then washed with fresh DMF and air-dried (yield 80%). Elemental analysis (%) for the JLU-Liu33: Calcd C, 55.36; H, 3.77; N, 1.47; Found C, 55.07; H, 3.88; N, 1.49. The purity of the bulk sample was confirmed by PXRD (see Figure S1 in the Supporting Information).
clean_text:
Synthesis of JLU-Liu33 

A mixture of H2DCPB (6 mg, 0.02 mmol), Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (9 mg, 0.03 mmol), DMF (1 mL), and triethylamine (0.025 mL) were kept at 85 °C for 12 h, followed by cooling to room temperature. Colorless octahedron crystals were obtained and then washed with fresh DMF and air-dried (yield 80%). Elemental analysis (%) for the JLU-Liu33: Calcd C, 55.36; H, 3.77; N, 1.47; Found C, 55.07; H, 3.88; N, 1.49. The purity of the bulk sample was confirmed by PXRD (see Figure S1 in the Supporting Information).
